name: Top Down shooter by idstudiosc
description:
Prototype of an engine of a Top Down Shooter by idstudiosc

in construct 2

-Creation of levels
-Use of global layers
- Customized movement behavior
-HUD Weapons selection.
-Enemy IA
-Boss IA (two states)

Change Controls

Key: 1  mouse - keyboard
     2  WASD - Arrow UP
Controls


Keyboard

W: Engine
S: Brake
A: Turn-Left
D: Turn-Right
Shoot: keyboard arrow-up
Change Weapon: Space

Keyboard-Mouse

W: Engine
S: Brake
Mouse
Turn-Left
Turn-Right
Shoot Left-Click
Change Weapon: Space
